snippet: If circumstances and political skill allowed President Obama to run in 2008 as something other than an ordinary politician, this time around he faces all the challenges, and carries much of the baggage, of any other standard-issue Democrat.
abstract: If circumstances and political skill allowed President Obama to run in 2008 as something other than an ordinary politician, this time around he faces all the challenges, and carries much of the baggage, of any other standard-issue Democrat.

headline.print_headline: Political Memo: Subtracting the Post From Post-Partisanship
